channel.title: finaly. cod4 hackers are noticed by infinity
channel.description: since the first time i played cod 4 online, iv'e been constant pissed at nfinityward since it is infact more hackers there than normal players. finaly, it seems that infinityward have figured out it is a good thing to try to do something about it. read [url]https://www.gamereactor.no/nyheter/118070/Kaos+i+Call+of+Duty+4/?sid=465c1dc9ea17cc35221a32648ab78ba6#211099[/url] but remember to activate google translate first since it's in norwegian XD. maybe it is finaly gonna be fun to play the game online again

item.title: finaly. cod4 hackers are noticed by infinity
item.dc:creator: ulvemann43
item.description:
JohnKiller118:

…so THAT’S why I hate Call of Duty now!
After the patch is released I’ll try it out again.

ditto

Read full topic

since the first time i played cod 4 online, iv’e been constant pissed at nfinityward since it is infact more hackers there than normal players. finaly, it seems that infinityward have figured out it is a good thing to try to do something about it.
read https://www.gamereactor.no/nyheter/118070/Kaos+i+Call+of+Duty+4/?sid=465c1dc9ea17cc35221a32648ab78ba6#211099 but remember to activate google translate first since it’s in norwegian XD.
